## HttpQueuer class

Class responsible for queuing and dispatching http requests ([OptimisticHttpRequest](./notification.optimistichttprequest.md)<!-- -->) Requires initalization by consumer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class HttpQueuer 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(store)](./notification.httpqueuer._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>HttpQueuer</code> class |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [initalize()](./notification.httpqueuer.initalize.md) |  | Initalizes the queue |
|  [next()](./notification.httpqueuer.next.md) |  | Allows the next in queue to execute. Should be called cautiously. |
